channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 11:34 Air alert in Zaporizhia region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 11:34 Air alert in Zaporizhia region. Follow further messages. #Zaporizhia_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 11:29 Threat of artillery shelling in Chervonohryhorivska territorial community repulsed. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 11:29 Threat of artillery shelling in Chervonohryhorivska territorial community repulsed. Stay tuned for further reports. #Chervonohryhorivska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 10:13 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
